text: Unit 7 is a jazz composition by bassist Sam Jones originally composed for the 1962 album Nancy Wilson/Cannonball Adderley. It's also known as "Cannon's Theme." == Notable recordings == * Cannonball Adderley – The Cannonball Adderley Sextet In New York (1962) * Sam Jones – Sam Jones & Co. – Down Home (1962) *Wes Montgomery and Wynton Kelly – Smokin' at the Half Note (1965) *The New York Jazz Guitar Ensemble – Four On Six: A Tribute To Wes Montgomery (1985) == References == Category:Jazz compositions
title: Unit 7 (jazz composition)
